title: Designing Calm Interfaces
excerpt: Small layout decisions that make readers feel at ease.
contentHtml:
Calm interfaces reward attention. They reduce friction by balancing contrast, spacing, and typography.

Make space to breathe

Use generous line-height, stable alignment, and a clear hierarchy to keep the reader oriented.

title: A Lightweight Content Pipeline with Next.js
excerpt: How to keep JSON content fast, searchable, and cache-friendly.
contentHtml:
JSON-first content can scale when you pair it with thoughtful caching and small helper utilities.

Cache intentionally

Use ISR to keep pages fresh without rebuilding on every change.

title: Performance Budgeting for Storytelling Sites
excerpt: Set realistic performance budgets while keeping your brand visuals intact.
contentHtml:
Performance budgets work best when they protect the most important brand assets.

Balance fidelity and speed

Start by keeping images responsive and validating every script you ship.
